tools.name: set_operation_mode
tools.description:
Set operation mode for the SVAN quadruped robot

    Args:
        mode: an integer value corresponding to a certain model.
            AVAILABLE MODES:
                - 1 (STOP)
                - 2 (TWIRL)
                - 3 (PUSH UP)

mode.description: an integer value corresponding to a certain model.

tools.name: set_movement
tools.description:
Set movement velocity for the SVAN quadruped robot

    Args:
        x_vel: float velocity in x-axis (-1.0 to 1.0). positive x-axis is to the right side of the robot
        y_vel: float velocity in y-axis (-1.0 to 1.0). positive y-axis is to the front of the robot.
        duration: float time for execution of movement in seconds. default to 5 seconds

x_vel.description: float velocity in x-axis (-1.0 to 1.0). positive x-axis is to the right side of the robot

y_vel.description: float velocity in y-axis (-1.0 to 1.0). positive y-axis is to the front of the robot.

duration.description: float time for execution of movement in seconds. default to 5 seconds

tools.name: set_roll
tools.description:
Sets the roll value of the SVAN quadruped robot.

    Args:
        roll: float value (-1.0 to 1.0) - positive roll is towards the right

roll.description: float value (-1.0 to 1.0) - positive roll is towards the right

tools.name: set_pitch
tools.description:
Sets the pitch of the SVAN quadruped robot.

    Args:
        pitch: float value (-1.0 to 1.0) - positive pitch is forwards.

pitch.description: float value (-1.0 to 1.0) - positive pitch is forwards.

tools.name: set_yaw
tools.description:
Sets the yaw direction of the robot

    Args:
        yaw: integer value corresponding to yaw angle presets
            0 - YAW LEFT
            1 - YAW RIGHT
            2 - NO YAW

yaw.description: integer value corresponding to yaw angle presets
